title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the widget is experiencing inefficient redraws. This can lead to performance issues and unnecessary resource consumption.
OB: The current behavior is causing multiple redraws for each visible line when the text is changed with word wrap enabled.
EB: This should be optimized to only perform a maximum of one redraw for each visible line when the text is changed with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText widget.
2. Change the text content programmatically or through user input.
3. Observe the number of redraws occurring for each visible line in the widget.
